a.n: Comment Je Me Suis Disputé... (ma Vie Sexuelle)

p.d: At the age of 29, Paul Dédalus is going round in circles. Unable to finish his thesis, languishing in a job as assistant lecturer at Nanterre University and unable to bring himself to break-up with Esther, his partner for the last ten years. But for Paul, decision time is near... Directed by: Arnaud Desplechin (France, 1996) Cast: Mathieu Amalric (Paul Dédalus), Emmanuelle Devos (Esther), Jeanne Balibar (Valérie), Thibault de Montalembert (Bob), Marianne Denicourt (Sylvia), Emmanuel Salinger (Nathan), Denis Podalydes (Jean-Jacques), Michel Vuillermoz (Frédéric Rabier), Chiara Mastroianni (Patricia) Genre: dramedy Awards: Best male newcomer for Mathieu Amalric (1997 César awards), official selection (1996 Cannes Film Festival)
